mapper.sql: SELECT U.id uid, name, fa_name faName, phone, U.src src, password, salt, sex, status, province, area, sign, email, register_time registerTime, last_login_time lastLoginTime, L.id lid, lama_name lamaName, L.src lsrc FROM cmfz.t_user U LEFT JOIN cmfz.t_lama L ON U.lama_id = L.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (id, name, fa_name, phone, src, password, salt, sex, status, province, area, sign, email, register_time, last_login_time, lama_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{faName}, #{phone}, #{src}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{sex}, #{status}, #{province}, #{area}, #{sign}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lama})
